contexts.context: "I am Kena Warfel Tomasin, and I can <mark>prove</mark> that Akatosh, Nirn, and Oblivion are one," said...
"I am Kena Zombel Mokafa, and I can <mark>prove</mark> that you do not exist," said Oin. He wrote...
...said Oin. He wrote out the mathematical formula, which <mark>proved</mark> correct, and Kena Warfel Tomasin vaporized on the spot....
...and went merrily upon his way. And thus Lord Vivec <mark>proved</mark> that ugliness is as much in one's manner as in one's...
...of rivals as a means to advancement. Those reluctant to <mark>prove</mark> their worthiness by killing off the competition, and those uncomfortable...
...Unbeliever may receive a blessing if he prays, if he <mark>proves</mark> his respect with a generous donation.
